com.brogrammers.agora.data

Interface DataManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheDataManager

    public interface DataManager
    Implements the basic data functions required to work on a list of questions and add questions, add answers, and add comments to the list of question objects. All classes that implements the DataManager all require these set of functionalities.
    Author:
    Group02

      • pushAnswer

        void pushAnswer(Answer a,
                java.lang.Long qID)
         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Pushes an answer to the target question object that contains the list of answers
        Parameters:
        a - the answer object to add to the quesiton
        qID - the unique question ID (i.e. the location where the answer is going)
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

        Pushes a comment to the target question or answer
        Parameters:
        c - the comment object
        qID - the target question ID
        aID - the target answer ID

        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
